scripts.serve: npm --prefix ../frontend run build && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore,hosting,auth --project demo-interdomestik
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test:coverage: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,auth "c8 --check-coverage --branches=75 --functions=75 --lines=75 --statements=75 -r text -r lcov mocha --timeout 10000 --require ts-node/register test/**/*.test.ts"
